metadata.title: CVE-2024-24789 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The archive/zip package's handling of certain types of invalid zip filesdiffers from the behavior of most zip implementations. This misalignmentcould be exploited to create an zip file with contents that vary dependingon the implementation reading the file. The archive/zip package now rejectsfiles containing these errors.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.17 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.20 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.21 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
